About me

Cinematography • Colour grading • Software development

I grew up in the French countryside until I moved to Scotland, aged 18. Since being a teenager, I’ve never considered a career in any other sector than content creation, which is why I spent years building and improving my filmmaking skillset. I now work as a freelance director of photography, and as camera operator/editor at Signal, an award-winning production company in Aberdeen.

As showcased on this website, I’ve enjoyed working on a wide range of projects including short films, web series, music videos, or corporate videos. With a focus on cinematography and colour grading, I am also a proficient video editor, graphic designer, VFX artist, and even software developer. This perhaps reveals what I enjoy most about content creation: mastering a wide array of technical skills to best articulate a creative idea.

Get in touch

If you would like to get in touch to discuss my work or a potential collaboration, please reach out to me at contact@piersdeseilligny.com
